issue.title: compile error in ARM64
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18067](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18067). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Compile error in ARM64，failed to verify the thirdparty boost's SHA256.

The boost's version is boost_1_75_0.tar.gz, download address is : <https://sourceforge.net/projects/boost/files/boost/1.75.0/>

![image-2022-10-15-11-08-33-142.png](https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/13050969/image-2022-10-15-11-08-33-142.png)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18067?focusedCommentId=17618009) by chenqiang (MacChen):*
The pr link is:

https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/14427

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18067?focusedCommentId=17618021) by Kouhei Sutou (kou):*
The SHA256 isn't for the original Boost 1.75.0's archive. It's for the our trimmed Boost 1.75.0's archive at https://apache.jfrog.io/artifactory/arrow/thirdparty/7.0.0/boost_1_75_0.tar.gz .
